0.name: G—Gonna Be Late!
0.fullDesc: Has {{1}} Hits Per Action by default. First, uses 1 hit to deal Ice DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{2}}%</orangeStrong> of Misha's ATK to a single target enemy. Then, the rest of the hits each deals Ice DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{2}}%</orangeStrong> of Misha's ATK to a single random enemy. Just before each hit lands, there is a <orangeStrong>{{3}}%</orangeStrong> <u>base chance</u> to Freeze the target, lasting for 1 turn.\nWhile Frozen, enemy targets cannot take any actions, and at the start of their turn, they receive <u>Additional Ice DMG</u> equal to <orangeStrong>{{4}}%</orangeStrong> of Misha's ATK.\nThis Ultimate can possess up to {{5}} Hits Per Action. After the Ultimate is used, its Hits Per Action will be reset to the default level.
0.shortDesc: Deals minor Ice DMG to single enemies. The attack bounces <orangeStrong>{{1}}</orangeStrong> times by default and up to a maximum of <orangeStrong>{{5}}</orangeStrong> times. Before each hits land, there is a minor chance to <color=#f29e38ff>Freeze</color> the target.

0.name: Wait, You Are So Beautiful!

Upon entering battle against enemies afflicted with Dream Prison, increases the Hits Per Action for Misha's next Ultimate by {{2}} hit(s). Only 1 dimension created by allies can exist at the same time.
0.shortDesc: Creates a dimension that stops all enemies within. Upon entering battle against enemies within the dimension, Misha's <color=#f29e38ff>next Ultimate deals more Hits Per Action</color>.
